this_title: Unauthorized Biography Beyonce: Baby and Beyond
introduction: Platinum-selling singer, A-list actress and new Mom, Beyoncé Knowles is a superstar with no limits. From Destiny's Child to her relationship with Jay-Z - and birth of their baby Blue Ivy - she's become an ever-evolving woman who can seemingly do no wrong. Featuring exclusive interviews with her family and inner circle of friends, Beyonce: Baby and Beyond provides an in-depth look at what drives this diva's passion for life!
foreign_title: Unauthorized Biography Beyonce: Baby and Beyond
